name: Defenders Of Greece
description:
Located on the persian battles, in Defenders of Greece you take a role of an general trying to protect Athens from Xerxes army! Use your strategy, to put your soldiers in the best spot. Collect mana from the Prayers to build defenses and call the Old Gods backup.

Level Design by: Lucas Freitas

Developed by: Diego Almeida Aguiar

Controls:
W, A, S, D - Camera movement
Mouse Scroll - Zoom
Mouse Right Button - Collect Mana/ Build Defenses
